subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
membership:
- ACTION: www.action.org 
Established in 2004, ACTION is an international partnership of civil society advocates from Kenya, Zambia, UK, France, Canada, US and Japan working to mobilize resources to treat and prevent the spread of tuberculosis (TB).  
- TB Europe Coalition: www.tbcoalition.eu 
- SDG Watch: https://www.sdgwatcheurope.org/  
- Coordination Sud: https://www.coordinationsud.org/
goals__remit:
Global Health Advocates (GHA) is an NGO. 
It aims to ensure public policies ensure the right to health for all. In partnership with civil society, our mission is political advocacy to ensure policies and 
resources are effectively addressing health inequalities.
